meanings.definition: The act of posting short messages or updates on a social media platform.
meanings.sent1: Microblogging allows users to share quick updates with their followers.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy using microblogging to stay connected with friends online.
meanings.sent3: The art of microblogging is like sending digital postcards to the world.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean of social media, microblogging is like throwing a small pebble of information.
meanings.sent5: Her passion for microblogging was evident in the frequency of her posts.

meanings.definition: A platform or website where users can post short messages or updates.
meanings.sent1: On the microblogging site, users can share their thoughts in brief posts.
meanings.sent2: I visit the microblogging platform daily to see the latest updates.
meanings.sent3: The microblogging website felt like a digital bulletin board for the community.
meanings.sent4: In the world of information, microblogging is a fast-paced express lane.
meanings.sent5: The popularity of microblogging platforms continues to grow among internet users.
